bibl.title: Callimachus and the Muses: Some Aspects of Narrative Technique in Aetia 1-2.
bibl.note: Article based on a paper given to staff and students of the Classical Institutes at Florence, London and Brussels (Vrije Universiteit); to the Hellenistenclub at Amsterdam and the Societas Philologica Graeca et Latina at Groningen.
bibl.seg: Harder Annette, Callimachus and the Muses: Some Aspects of Narrative Technique in Aetia 1-2.
